name: Enterprise Hospital Admin and Management

screenshots.caption: User Data Table with CURD AJAX opertion

short_description:
ELHMAS is  complete enterprise level Hospital administration and management system.E-HAS is Designed in such a way that it can support any type Hospital (Speciality Or General Hospital).With Online / Offline working capability for distributed Chains of Hospitals and Data mining Capability.

FOR ONLINE DEMO AND CODES:-

http://techdynamics.org/ehas.php
E-Mail:-saba.wasim.it@gmail.com

Features

Mobile/Tablet/Desktop Supported

Online/Offline or Cloud Supported

All Modules from Reception to Discharge Summary.

Hospital  Business Analytic

Jquery / Ajax for Dynamic UI Experience

Manages All types of Hospital System and Formats

Bar code Scanner Supported


FINANCE Module

BILLING Module

OPD/IPD Module

PHARMACY Module

PATHOLOGY Module

CASUALTY Module

OT Module

SECURITY Module

IPD EMERGENCY Section

LAUNDRY Section

NURSING Module

PATIENT  Module

ADMINISTRATION Section

SURGERY  Section

ACCOMMODATION Section

STAFF MODULE
summary: A online Enterprise Hospital Administration and management system
